summary: Clean save after getting off the wagon at the start (before character creation).
descriptionHtml:
[b]File Description:
[/b]
I kept the original save from the first time I played Skyrim so that I could start from just before character creation on new games. This is a clean save (I hadn't downloaded so much as a texture replacement at the time of this save), and starts just before Hadvar begins roll call.

Install instructions: Unzip the file to Documents/My Games/Skyrim/Saves
author: Bethesda
